description: This authentic rural trattoria overlooking the valley and Franciacorta specialises in regional produce and typical Italian cuisine. Each dish on the menu lists the origin of the ingredients used, plus the name and address of the producer. Specialities include tagliolini pasta sautéed in a walnut sauce with tuna. Top quality cuisine offering excellent value for money.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
